saṃprajanyaṃ tadāyāti na ca yātyāgataṃ punaḥ /
kṛtaṃ kalpasahasrairyatpratighaḥ pratihanti tat // SBca_6.1 //  na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /

alpamapyasya doṣaṃ ca prakāśaya mahāmuneḥ // SBca_8.162 //
